short_summary: Supply and delivery of Spectrophotometer equipment
description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), Summerland Research and Department of Agricultural Food Centre (SRD), require the supply and delivery SUN lamp of one (1) UV-Visible Spectrophotometer with Xenon one (1) Multi-channel pipette accessory with associated locking tips.
full_summary:
### Description of Government Tender Announcement
#### Tender Number and Details
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contract number | 01550-240449C |
| Tender title (English) | Spectrophotometer |
| Tender title (French) | Spectrophotomètre |

| Publication date | 2024-02-01 |
| Tender closing date | 2024-03-12T14:00:00 |
| Amendment number | 0 |
| Expected contract start date | None |
| Expected contract end date | 2024-03-31 |

#### Tender Information
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement category | Goods and Services |
| Notice type (English) | Request for Proposal |
| Notice type (French) | Demande de propositions |
| Procurement method | Competitive - Selective tendering |
| Selection criteria | Lowest Price |

#### Tender Requirements
We require the supply and delivery of one (1) UV-Visible Spectrophotometer with Xenon flash lamp and one (1) Multi-channel pipette accessory with associated locking tips.

#### Location of Requirement
The required goods will be delivered to the Summerland Research and Development Centre (SuRDC) of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), located in Summerland, British Columbia.

#### Contact Information
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact name: Phelan, Samantha (SPAC/PSPC) (they/them/she/her)
* Contact email: samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact phone: N/A
* Contact address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Tender Sources
You can obtain more information about this tender through the following website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18683324?extsite=MTg2ODMzMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (English) and https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18683324?extsite=MTg2ODMzMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (French) Note: The tender is only available in electronic format.
